class  SimulationKernelFunctor

Detailed Description

Controls the simulation.

The class SimulationControl provides code to set up a new simulation (and cleanup any old one) as well as start/pause/terminate the Simulation–Thread. Furthermore it provides a method called process simulation that is responsible for consuming the history’s elements according to the Processing–Time.

Author:
Daniel Wonisch
